name: radioactivity_concentration_of_83Br_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Br" means the element "bromine" and "83Br" is the isotope "bromine-83" with a half-life of 1.00e-01 days.
